Comment: Correct me if I'm wrong, but from my brief look at his channel, it seems as though he's focused more on the Trump administration's economic and social policy rather than the man's character. I'm not questioning the efficacy of Trump's approach to politics. There is still plenty of time left to see how well he does as president. I'm more just curious about your judge of his character based on the words that leave his mouth and his actions. From the hours of footage that I've watched from him, he very rarely has anything of meaning or substance to say and, instead, resorts to diatribe and vaguery. He responds to challenging lines of questioning with accusations of bad reporting and fake news. He just doesn't do much to inspire faith in himself as a genuine leader who has the best in mind for the people of your country and, by extension, the west.
